sentences.sContent: Transient thermal response of a spherical aerostat in rising process was studied based on this model.
sentences.sContent_eng: Transient thermal response of a spherical aerostat in rising process was studied based on this model.
sentences.sCn: 通过建立平流层浮空器的热模型，对球形浮空器升空过程中的瞬态热响应进行了数值模拟。

sentences.sContent: The ability of intercepting and tracking for air defense antimissile system can be effectively improved by top observation with aerostat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ability of intercepting and tracking for air defense antimissile system can be effectively improved by top observation with aerostat.
sentences.sCn: 利用浮空器进行俯视观测可有效提高防空反导系统的截获、跟踪目标能力。

trans.tranOther: a lighter-than-air craft, such as a balloon
